```{r include = F}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(car)

# load models
let_mod <- readRDS('lettermod.rds')
numb_mod <- readRDS('numbmod.rds')
body_mod <- readRDS('bodymod.rds')
```

```{r echo = F}
# letter table
let_aov <- Anova(let_mod)
kable(let_aov)
```
